name: Wiseman Aviation, Inc.
about: Wiseman Aviation, Inc., located at the Flagstaff Pulliam Airport, is a family-owned and operated fixed-base operator (FBO) that offers a comprehensive range of aviation services. We provide fueling and ground services, including high-speed internet, a pilot lounge, catering assistance, oxygen service, and aircraft maintenance. Our flight training program is designed to meet the needs of aspiring pilots, offering FAA-approved instruction and a supportive learning environment. Additionally, we supply pilot essentials and maintain a commitment to traditional aviation products and services, distinguishing us from many modern FBOs that outsource non-fuel related services. Our dedication to continuity in operations and personalized service sets us apart, making Wiseman Aviation a trusted name in general aviation. We are proud to serve the aviation community with integrity and excellence.
